mapper.select: SELECT sp.sp_bno, plan.plan_quantity, sp.sp_unit, sp.sp_date, w.w_code, fpl.fpl_no, p.p_code, fpc.fpc_expirydate, fpc.fpc_bno, plan.plan_id FROM stock_products sp LEFT JOIN warehouses w ON sp.w_code = w.w_code LEFT JOIN products p ON sp.p_code = p.p_code LEFT JOIN finished_products_control fpc ON sp.fpc_bno = fpc.fpc_bno LEFT JOIN production_plan plan ON sp.plan_id = plan.plan_id LEFT JOIN finished_products_lot fpl ON sp.fpl_no = fpl.fpl_no WHERE plan.plan_quantity > 0 ORDER BY ${sortColumn} ${sortDirection}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stock_products sp JOIN warehouses w ON sp.w_code = w.w_code JOIN products p ON sp.p_code = p.p_code JOIN finished_products_control fpc ON sp.fpc_bno = fpc.fpc_bno JOIN production_plan plan ON sp.plan_id = plan.plan_id JOIN finished_products_lot fpl ON sp.fpl_no = fpl.fpl_no
WHERE plan.plan_quantity > 0
